message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $135?
I understand that $180 is a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $135. I can meet you in the middle at $165, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $165 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $145 for the product. Can you consider that?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, but I still need to make a profit. I can do $157.50, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think, Bob?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $157.50 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $152.50 for the product. Can you consider that?
I'm starting to feel like we're really close to a deal, Bob. I can do $155, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. I'm not sure I want to go any lower than that. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $155, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm willing to pay $152. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

I'm starting to think we're getting a bit too close to the bottom of my pricing range, Bob. I can do $154, but that's really as low as I'm willing to go. I'm not sure I want to sell it to you for any less than that. What do you think?

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm really close to my budget. I'm willing to pay $151 for the product. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying it from John for $150.
